name: Millennium Neck Pillow
descr:
Millennium Neck Pillow

The Chiroform Millennium Neck Pillow helps you to re-establish and preserve the natural forward curve of your neck. The Neck Pillow is easy to bring to work and on travels.

The Chiroform Neck Pillow is made from PU foam.

Delivered with a soft and comfortable velvet cover. Stitched inner cover.
